workflow.description:
Newly created customer undergoes approval when Terms selected is NOT Due on Receipt or Prepaid.
Approver is either Finance Management.
workflow.name: Kodella | New Customer Approval

showmessageaction.messagetext: This customer is not yet active and is for approval.

initcondition.formula: "Terms" NOT IN ("Term1","Term2","Term3","Term4") AND "Old Record:Terms" NOT IN ("Terms")
